caption.p: Phytotoxic activity of the EO from Saudi and Egyptian ecotypes of C. procera on the ( a) seed germination, ( b) seedling shoot growth, and ( c) seedling root growth of Bidens pilosa. * p < 0.05 (two-tailed t-test). Different letters per each line mean significant difference (one-way randomized blocks ANOVA). Data are mean value ( n = 3) and the bars represent the standard error.
